price: Namni (addunyaa) tana keessatti jaamaa (qalbii) ta’e,inni aakhiraa keessattis jaamaadha; karaadhaanis irra jallataadha.
arabic: وَمَن كَانَ فِي هَٰذِهِۦٓ أَعۡمَىٰ فَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waman kāna fī hādhihi aʿmā fahuwa fī al-ākhirati aʿmā wa-aḍallu sabīlan
